Package views

Class PatientView

java.lang.Object
views.PatientView
All Implemented Interfaces:
iPatientView
public class PatientView extends Object implements iPatientView
The PatientView class provides the user interface for patients. It allows patients to view their details, manage appointments, view billing information, and update contact details.
